connectionListDescription: The following connections are available to be added to integrations. Click a connection to view its configuration details.
cannotDelete: Unable to delete this connection as it is being used by one or more integrations
connectionDeletedFailed: An error occurred deleting connection "{{connectionName}}." Details: {{details}}
deleteModalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{connectionName}}" connection?
duplicateNameError: That name is taken. Try another.
errorSavingConnection: Unexpected server error saving the connection.
errorValidatingDetails: Unexpected server error validating the connection details.
errorValidatingName: Unexpected server error validating connection name.

create.unsavedChangesTitle: Do you really want to cancel?
create.unsavedChangesMessage: You have not finished creating the connection. If you cancel now you will lose data you already entered. Do you still want to cancel?

configure.title: Configure connection
configure.configurationDescription: Log into your {{name}} account to grant authorization for $t(shared:project:name) to act on your behalf.

oauth.title: {{name}} Configuration
oauth.description: This connection is configured using OAuth. Use the validate button to check if the connection is still authorized.
oauth.settingsMissing: OAuth settings needed to create this connection are missing. Provide the required parameters in the OAuth settings.
